docs.snippet: One man’s soul searching decision on whether or not he should join Facebook sets him off on an epic journey of self-discovery as he weighs the pros and cons of becoming a member of the world’s largest social networking site.   Along the way he tal...

The online payments company will allow its customers to buy and target Facebook ads and then use sales data to assess the impact of those ads.

headline.print_headline: Facebook and Square Assess Ads as a Team
headline.main: Square Teams Up With Facebook to Offer Ads That Can Be Gauged

docs.abstract: Square announces partnership with Facebook under which small businesses using payment processing service will be able to buy and target Facebook advertising using Square software; ads bought in this way will have added benefit of sales and activity data that paint clearer picture of customer behavior online.

docs.snippet: Facebook is shutting down Parse, a toolkit and support system for mobile developers, which it acquired in 2013.

headline.print_headline: Facebook to Shut Parse, a Tool Kit for Developers
headline.main: Facebook to Shut Down Parse, Its Platform for Mobile Developers

docs.abstract: Facebook is shutting down Parse, a toolkit and support system for mobile developers, which it acquired in 2013.

docs.snippet: There is no real America to take back, as Trump insists, because America’s many-hued reality is a ceaseless becoming.
The founder of the social networking service has learned Mandarin and charmed audiences. But with a public presence in China comes official scrutiny.

headline.print_headline: Seeking Access to Facebook in China, Zuckerberg Courts Risks
headline.main: Seeking Access to Facebook in China, Zuckerberg Courts Risks

docs.abstract: Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg has garnered widespread publicity for his outreach in China, meeting with prominent political and business leaders there, but it remains unclear whether charm offensive will convince government to lift domestic ban on his service; Zuckberg's success or failure could provide important lesson for other tech businesses that are eager to enter enormous but restrictive market.

headline.main: If the Trans-Pacific Partnership Crumbles, China Wins

docs.snippet: What is wrong with little old “you” and “me”? They are words too short and plain for the British hospitality industry.

headline.main: Facebook’s Safety Check, Now Automated, Turns a Firecracker Into an Explosion
